```{r}
ylabs = c("Mean age", "Mean cholestrol (mg/d)", "Mean blood pressure (mm Hg)", "Mean maximum heart rate achieved", "Mean ST depression induced by execercise")
feature_names = c("age", "chol", "trestbps", "thalach","oldpeak")
names(ylabs) = feature_names

for (feature_name in feature_names){
  ylab = ylabs[feature_name]
  barplot(c(mean(subset(data, target==0)[,feature_name]), mean(subset(data, target==1)[,feature_name])), 
          xlab="Heart Disease", names.arg=c("No", "Yes"), ylab=ylab,
          col=c("olivedrab3","indianred2"))
}
```
Notes: 
ST depression induced by execercise relative to rest (oldpeak) seems to be a very significant indicator of heart disease.
